name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT Folders, Search, Bookmarks - ChatFolderz: AI Chat Organizer Tool.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your AI conversations into Folders, Bookmark key discussions, Search, Prompts Library and more...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is your ultimate AI chat management tool, designed to streamline conversations with GPT, Claude, and more. Easily organize your chats into folders, bookmark important discussions, and search across all conversations to find exactly what you need—fast. Plus, a high-quality prompt library is on the way, along with more exciting features to boost your productivity and enhance your AI experience. Say goodbye to clutter and hello to a smarter, more organized workflow!

Managing AI chats doesn’t have to be a headache. Our extension gives you the power to:

Organize Conversations into Folders – No more scrolling endlessly to find that one chat. Sort and categorize your conversations effortlessly.
Bookmark Important Chats – Keep your crucial chats just a click away.
Search Across All Conversations – Find exactly what you need in seconds with our powerful search feature.
Tag and Categorize Chats – Create your own tags and categories to keep everything tidy.
Prompt Library Coming Soon – Elevate your AI interactions with ready-to-use, high-quality prompts designed for maximum efficiency.
With these tools, your AI chats will be more than just conversations—they’ll become an organized, easy-to-access knowledge base.

Ready to upgrade your AI experience? This is your ultimate AI chat solution. Simplify your workflow, boost productivity, and get more done in less time.

What are you waiting for? Say goodbye to chaos and hello to streamlined AI management today!
